alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Campbell; Kenton; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 2:10PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRACKEN...SOUTHERN KENTON... CAMPBELL...CENTRAL PENDLETON...CLERMONT...BROWN...NORTHWESTERN ADAMS...SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON AND HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EST... At 210 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near New Vienna to 7 miles north of Williamsburg to 6 miles southwest of Claryville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. In addition, bridges and overpasses may become briefly snow covered and slick. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Hillsboro, Georgetown, Falmouth, Claryville, Amelia, Mount Orab, Bethel, New Richmond, Williamsburg, Batavia, Lynchburg, New Vienna, Augusta, Winchester, Marshall, Sardinia, Seaman, Felicity, and Brooksville. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
